description: Nishizawa Kazuki is http://anidb.net/ch628 [Ayumu]`s younger brother and a http://anidb.net/ch618 [Wataru]`s friend. A year ago, Kazuki met http://anidb.net/ch528 [Nagi] who was trying to get a balloon which was stuck in a tree and fell in love with her at first sight. When he met her again in Wataru`s store he invited her to a walk and finally confessed his love to her. During their "date" she told she already loves someone and after Hayate saving her from falling in a lake Kazuki realised it was him she loves.
name: Nishizawa Kazuki
